Package com.smartnsoft.droid4me.download

Contains utilities for downloading bitmaps and binding them to ImageView or any widget which can display a Bitmap.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
BasisDownloadInstructions.InputStreamDownloadInstructor When the input stream related to an bitmap needs to be downloaded asynchronously, this interface enables to indicate it, and to notify the owner when the input stream has been actually downloaded.
BasisDownloadInstructions.Instructions<BitmapClass extends DownloadContracts.Bitmapable,ViewClass extends DownloadContracts.Viewable> Enables the bitmap downloader to know on how to handle a command.
DownloadContracts.Bitmapable An abstraction of a Bitmap which makes possible the writing of unitary tests.
DownloadContracts.Handlerable An abstraction of a android.os.Handle which makes possible the writing of unitary tests.
DownloadContracts.Viewable An abstraction of a View which makes possible the writing of unitary tests.
 

Class Summary
BasisBitmapDownloader<BitmapClass extends DownloadContracts.Bitmapable,ViewClass extends DownloadContracts.Viewable,HandlerClass extends DownloadContracts.Handlerable> An implementation of the CoreBitmapDownloader class, which is independent from the Android platform.
BasisDownloadInstructions Gathers in one place the download instructions contracts used by BitmapDownloader.
BasisDownloadInstructions.AbstractInstructions<BitmapClass extends DownloadContracts.Bitmapable,ViewClass extends DownloadContracts.Viewable> An implementation of the BasisDownloadInstructions.Instructions, which returns the bitmapUid as an URL, and which does not present any temporary nor local bitmap.
BasisDownloadInstructions.SimpleInstructions<BitmapClass extends DownloadContracts.Bitmapable,ViewClass extends DownloadContracts.Viewable>  
BitmapDownloader A first implementation of the CoreBitmapDownloader class.
CoreBitmapDownloader<BitmapClass extends DownloadContracts.Bitmapable,ViewClass extends DownloadContracts.Viewable,HandlerClass extends DownloadContracts.Handlerable> Responsible for downloading the bitmaps in dedicated threads and to bind them to Android Views.
DownloadContracts Gathers in one place all contracts related to the ImageDownloader.
DownloadInstructions Gathers in one place the download instructions contracts used by BitmapDownloader.
DownloadInstructions.AbstractInstructions An implementation of the DownloadInstructions.Instructions, which returns the bitmapUid as an URL, and which does not present any temporary nor local bitmap.
DownloadInstructions.BitmapableBitmap An implementation of the DownloadInstructions.BitmapableBitmap interface specific to the Android platform.
DownloadInstructions.HandlerableHander An implementation of the DownloadContracts.Handlerable interface specific to the Android platform.
DownloadInstructions.Instructions Enables the bitmap downloader to know on how to handle a command.
DownloadInstructions.SimpleInstructions A very simple implementation of the DownloadInstructions.Instructions, which by-passes the persistence option.
DownloadInstructions.ViewableView An implementation of the DownloadContracts.Viewable interface specific to the Android platform.
DownloadSpecs Gathers in one place some commonly used specifications used by the BitmapDownloader.
DownloadSpecs.DefaultImageSpecs Enables to express an image specification, with a size and a default image resource id, in case the URL does not correspond to an image.
DownloadSpecs.OrientedImageSpecs Enables to express an image specification, which indicates the size and orientation.
DownloadSpecs.SizedImageSpecs Enables to express an image specification, which indicates its size and a temporary image resource identification.
DownloadSpecs.TemporaryAndNoImageSpecs Enables to indicate the identifier of the image resource that should be used when loading, and the identifier of the image resource that should be used in case the underlying bitmap cannot be retrieved.
DownloadSpecs.TemporaryImageSpecs Enables to express an image specification with a default image resource identifier, in case the URL does not correspond to an image.
 

Package com.smartnsoft.droid4me.download Description

Contains utilities for downloading bitmaps and binding them to ImageView or any widget which can display a Bitmap.
